Self.Wiki: This map object represents a region within the map.

Rotation.Wiki: Rotation of the part, in degrees.

RegionID.Wiki: Identifies the region in event scripts.

MapStudioLayer.Wiki: Controls whether the region is active in different ceremonies.

Common_PartName.Wiki: The region remains inactive until the specified part is rendered. Empty means it is always active.

Common_EntityID.Wiki: Identifies this region in event scripts.
